kizuna_rival_b_01:
So you’re good for a battle, right? Great! Meet
you at the schoolyard in a minute?[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_b_mob_01:
Uhhh, hold up—you’re Nemona, right? Like, the
student council president? That Nemona?
kizuna_rival_b_mob_02:
Ah hah hah...hah. Yeeeah. Maybe some
other time.
kizuna_rival_b_04: Oh, him? Dunno who he was![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_b_05:
I was just munching my sandwich and I heard him
bragging about his tough Pokémon, so I invited\r
him to battle![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_b_06:
I wonder what Pokémon he’s gonna use?
Can’t wait to see![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_b_07:
Wait, I forgot to get his contact info! How are we
supposed to plan when we’ll face off?[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_b_08:
Oh well. I’ll make sure we battle next time I run
into him![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_b_09: Anyway, guess you came to get some grub, huh?[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_b_10:
Well, I’m not one to stand between someone
and their meal! Catch you later![npcn:4]
